listChange.change: Pause in the writing and corrections of first stanza. By Pascoli, using ink.
Work on an isolated line of the first stanza.
Work on the last 3 lines of st.1.
New version of st. 1 including previous modifications.
Detail work on the end of lines 2 and 3.
Detail work on the last 3 lines of st. 1 (in the margin).
New detail work on lines 2 and 3 (in the margin).
Pascoli writes st. 2 and the beginning of st. 3.
New detail work on st. 3(end of a line).
New version of st. 3. Pascoli tries to fix the last modifications.
New version of st. 3. Pascoli writes also st. 4 and the beginning of st. 5. With instant corrections.
Pascoli adds on margin right the themes of st. 5 and 6.
Pascoli rewrites st. 1, 2 and 3 to fix it.
Deletion of this version and new version.
Pascoli writes the st. 5 which will be the final st. 6.
New version of st. 5/6 on margin right.
New version of st. 5/6 on margin right.
New wave of writing, on the seventh stanza. By Pascoli, using ink.
New wave of writing on the eigth-ninth stanza. By Pascoli, using ink.
Classification elements. By Maria Pascoli, using pencil.
Classification elements. By the Archive, using pencil.
